title: Acupuncture Therapies Catskills, NYC | YO1 Longevity & Health Resorts
description: Acupuncture Therapies in NYC. At YO1, get the best acupuncture therapy experience from our highly experienced licensed acupuncturists.
cleaned_text: Like all therapies at YO1, you will be evaluated for your unique concerns and conditions before you participate in acupuncture therapy. Depending on your diagnosis and plan, you may receive the healing benefits of acupuncture every day or every other day. This will ensure that the diet, yoga, and other therapies you are undergoing during your stay are effectively synchronized with your acupuncture therapy. Coming to YO1 is the first step to creating balance in both your body and your life, and acupuncture is just one of the ways you can achieve that. BENEFITS OF ACUPUNCTURE Read: [Detox and rejuvenate with Acupuncture](./../health-guide/detox-and-rejuvenate-with-acupuncture.html) ACUPUNCTURAL THERAPIES AURICULAR ACUPUNCTURE Find relief from feelings of anxiety and depression with this acupuncture therapy. The points on the ear correlate to each organ and part of the body, therefore, stimulation of these points through acupuncture can help a variety of health conditions. This therapy can be used to manage symptoms from anxiety, depression, PTSD, and smoking. MERIDIAN/BALANCE METHOD Promote circulation in the body with this invigorating acupuncture therapy. This therapy promotes proper circulation through the body to bring blood, oxygen, and chemical signals to different parts of the body for optimal wellness. This therapy results in the promotion of the body's ability to self-heal. BOOK YOUR HEALTH PROGRAMS AND THERAPIES NOW We welcome the opportunity to assist you.
